name: Trongle
description:
Well trangle me trongles! Trongle is a bright and breezy color matching board game. Trangle the trongles by turning, spinning and flipping them til they match their neighbors, locking them in place. Get tricks and trends for bonus trinkets, and finish triumphant!

TRIVIAL TO PICK UP, TRICKY TO MASTER
Play is as simple as turning and swapping trongles. But completing a board is only half the story - how many trick moves can you make to maximize your trinkets and trophies?

TROUNCE 100+ BOARDS
Big boards, little boards, hollow boards, spiky boards, funny face shaped boards - Trongle’s got them all! Each shape makes for a new challenge to your play style.

TRUCKLOADS OF REPLAY VALUE
Triumph is just the beginning - replay boards to trangle more trongles, score more trinkets, win more trophies, beat your own records and feel the satisfaction of seeing the awards rack up on each board.

TRY CRAFTING YOUR OWN CUSTOM BOARDS
Complete the challenges to unlock the custom board builder and create your own boards. Let your creativity run wild crafting your own unique challenges!

More info: https://quoxel.games/trongle
